name: Harlan Charles
text: The phone rings and rings. It's either the best pizza hut or the worst. I'd say the latter.

text: This is a terrible restaurant.  We've ordered twice and each time it has been completely disgusting.  The first time we ordered we didn't receive half of what we ordered...we sent the delivery driver back for the rest and we still didn't …More

text: Placed an order, followed with texts, order arrived pretty much on time. Gave guy a 20% tip, walked inside, order was wrong - missing a pizza and the brownie. Called and let it ring until someone picked up (granted, was 5 minutes to close, …More

text: Ordered honey bque wings and they came with some bque sauce dribbled over the top. I could have done it at home was so disappointed in this . Guess we won’t be eating there again especially for wings .

text: Horrible customer services place was dirty had my order completely wrong didnt wear mask gloves etc will never use again place needs shut down or new.owners who care

text: They forgot the salsa for the taco pizza and when told about it, they didn't fix it but said that they will do their job next time...well I've came back about six months after this post and ordered two pizzas and a taco pizza while I was on …More

text: Every time we order pizza they get our order wrong they always add unwanted items such as sausages olives etc, they always overprice us.

text: Never answer there phone, food is always wrong and it takes forever for them to make the food. Rude to my kids and was more worried about his own personal phone than the pizza hut establishment. I wouldn't even bother with this pizza hut in Lexington.

name: John Sweeney
text: If I could put no stars I would have done that! Called to have a delivery to the motel in was staying at, which was about  5 minute drive away. They girl Christine said that don’t deliver that far! So the guy at the front desk (who …More

name: Ramon Prado
text: I have been a customer of pizza hut for the last ten years. Lately, (6 to 8 mo) I have noticed a big change in customer service, cleanliness, product availability, and proper functioning of their equipment. They hardly ever answer the …More

name: Pnutz
text: They corrected their mistakes, pizza arrived sooner than expected on their second trip. Made sure order was made fresh again. So good customer service and delivery was fast. Delivery guy was great and very nice. Food was awesome. Thanks guys.

name: Young Love
text: Burnt pizza and smelling bad disgusting pizza

name: Jodi Moore
text: Food was nasty waiter was rude and the whole place was dirty never again will I go there

name: NORMA CERANO
text: YEEPPP, GOOD FOOD AND SALAD FRESH...

name: Alyssa Collins
text: WORST PIZZA HUTT EVER. IAM a pizza love and a huge pizza Hutt fan but this place was just terrible. I ordered extra cheese, I didn't get it, as well as ranch that I didn't get either. AND THE PIZZA WASN'T CUT! NEVER GO HERE.

name: Rex Adams
text: Best Pizza Hut around! My family orders from here pretty regularly when we want pizza, and they rarely disappoint. Very good quality, and the service in the restaurant is first rate. When I go there for lunch meetings the service is fantastic. They always take great care of us, and the pizza is amazing. Highly recommended!

name: Cindy Meyer
text: Called for a hour and no-one ever answered. How the hell do they think they are ever gonna have a good business.

name: nicole farber
text: First time they've actually answered the phone in 3 weeks. With the first time, they hung up. When I ordered, the young lady answering the phone didn't know what Canadian Bacon was. When I finally said ham, she still thought I was crazy. …More

name: Sarah Keim
text: We walk in at 6pm, no one else was there eating should of been our first hint.  The manager told us to find our own seat.  The waiter gave us the menu and ask what we wanted to drink.  He walked away and filled his own soda a few times in …More

name: Drew Wile
text: I was in town picking up a load at Tyson, the gentleman that took my call was courteous, double checked the order and assured me that they would deliver to my truck as soon as their driver came in at 17:00. 16:50 and the delivery driver was …More

name: Kim Ramirez
text: I keep returning expecting better results but it never happens. This will be our last time.

name: still sick
text: Inside isn't pretty but just do take out

name: Becky Saddler
text: The service was pleasant. They were out of several things. The place was filthy! No soap in the bathrooms. Avoid this place if possible.

name: Timaree Zadel
text: Went for lunch buffet and they were really busy. Had to wait a little bit for fresh pizzas to come out. But the staff was understanding and helpful and friendly even though it was a difficult lunch rush.

name: Jonathan Gonzalez
text: Order wings never have them, ordered pizza the place was closed. Poor service, not the quality pizza hut you expect. Have no idea how they are still open. DON'T BUY FOOD HERE!

name: Daniel P. Landin
text: The food was good, what you'd expect from Pizza Hut. The restaurant was dirty and the staff, though nice, struggled to keep up with only a small handful of orders around 2pm which led to long waits for us and every other customer. Also, the bathrooms show no recent evidence of having been cleaned.

name: rudy hernandez
text: Service needs a bit work on

name: Brittany JNB Stables Labradoodles
text: Maybe they are not used to having dine-in customers in the evening but we were the only patrons. Dining room was a mess, order took forever to receive, they were out of kids cups, lemonade, personal pizza crust. It just was not a good experience.

name: Steve Stumpff
text: The place is not kept up very well, but at least there's a very loud phone constantly ringing that no one answers.   Luckily, the service is so slow that you can get up way before they've brought you anything you'll need to pay for before you leave .

name: Ieshea Sepeda
text: Very disappointed  order pizza they didn't take my card number over phone than driver comes  out they didn't take it.. store closed at 9 it was 8:00 when I ordered  it ... manager  was rude n didn't care... never will we order from yous again ...

name: Bryon Myers
text: Food was good. Service on the other hand was lacking to say the least. Our server was to occupied with who I would guess was her boyfriend.

name: Eric Wallis
text: Can't believe you don't start delivery until 5pm... RIP off location here in Lexington, NE.

name: Candiss R
text: GROSS! Bathrooms were absolutely disgusting! There was grime dripping down the walls and don't get me started on the toilet. The food didn't taste good. Probably because if the bathrooms looked that bad they probably don't clean the kitchen either.

name: Nizar Rasho
text: Dirty place. Should clean and hygiene their restuarant first.

name: Kristian Seberger
text: The pizza is getting better! Will return!

name: Samuel Luna
text: Honesty every time I order they say 20 minutes but when I do go in 20 minutes I have to wait another 20 or 30 minutes. While the food is good the service and wait time is far less than ideal or fair.

name: Cristobal Gonzalez
text: Pizza Hut is honestly life! They have great service! Never a let down.

name: J Roberts
text: Seems to be under new management, it's gone down hill. Food is never ready when they say it will be. Half the time the orders are wrong. Casey's pizza is better, but they don't offer some of the stuff pizza hit offer so that's the only reason I order from them.

name: Makayla Adams
text: Asked for a delivery and ordered pizza and breadsticks and they only brought the pizza and when we called back they didn't care to fix it. Bad service overall.

name: Galen Mchugh
text: Went for the buffet during buffet hours but only got a choice of two ,what looked unapitizing choices.

name: sarah martin
text: The only reason it is getting a 1 star is because once you finally do revive your food it is pretty good. Customer service is not great. Depends on the day. They do not know how to handle rushes!

name: Daniel Hunt
text: Passing through, only place to deliver to hotel in town. Order incomplete when delivered, although driver did bring drink back an hour later , it was wrong! Pizza was good! Service not so much.

name: The Very Hungry Singularity
text: They don't deliver

name: Ryan Hinrich
text: Between 6pm and 7pm I call for a carry out multiple times. They refused to awnser and the 1 time they picked up I was hung up on. I drove across town figuring they are having phone issues and when I went in I heard the manager say don't awnser the phone and it looked like they just wanted to close early

text: I found a piece of wood in my slice of pizza. Until I bit into the wood the pizza was tasty.
